text: Form, massing, and heritage z Height Strategy: Appropriate height of 146m at tallest points, which should be at the northern and eastern edges of the site. Other taller buildings of 131m and 117m in the north, and 125m in the east. z Development should respond positively to the local character of the surrounding built environment and its dockside location, and should step down from Marsh Wall to the smaller-scale residential areas south of Millwall Dock. z Protect and enhance the setting of the Maritime Greenwich world heritage site and the historic dockside promenade.
